extendedInfo.description: - Create and manage your tasks, goals and projects, events (fixed, annual and weekly) and notes- Monitor your schedule using the Calendar screen- Organise and keep on top of items by prioritising, sorting and flagging them- Use the various widgets including the Items and Item Countdown widgets to stay informedTasks & Goals+ unlocks the following extra features:- No Ads displayed- View and edit items (including Android Calendar items) directly from the Calendar screen- Option to protect access to your data using a login pattern- Option to import and export your data (CSV file format)
